text: I mean sure package managers introduce security issues. So does downloading software. I don't really care, to be honest. People who are that worried about it lock down everything and inspect machine code on airgapped computers. Everyone else is like "thank the dieties I didn't have to manually install 400 deps with Make"

elements.text: I mean sure package managers introduce security issues. So does downloading software. I don't really care, to be honest. People who are that worried about it lock down everything and inspect machine code on airgapped computers. Everyone else is like "thank the dieties I didn't have to manually install 400 deps with Make"

text: Are you sure that's not just because you're used to an ecosystem that other people have worked hard to be malware-free?
